spell_tooltip.description: Surging Totem is 50% more effective and costs 60% less mana.

Summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec.

Whenever enemies within 26 yards of the totem deal direct damage, the totem will deal 100% of the damage dealt back to attacker.

Unleash your Elemental Shield's energy on an enemy target:

Lightning Shield: Knocks them away.

Earth Shield: Roots them in place for 2 sec.

Water Shield: Summons a whirlpool for 6 sec, reducing damage and healing by 50% while they stand within it.
Heals the friendly target for 299,709, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 303,015, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 311,305, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 204,074 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 203,393 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 202,180 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 79,386 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 187,672 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
Ghost Wolf removes snares and increases your movement speed by an additional 25% for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 20 sec.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
When Capacitor Totem fades or is destroyed, another Capacitor Totem is automatically dropped in the same place.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.
Purify Spirit additionally removes all Curse effects.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 13 yards 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 16,078 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon imbues are increased by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that removes all Poison effects from a nearby party or raid member within 39 yards every 1.5 sec for 9 sec.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.7 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 379,387 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 285,750 and an additional 178,420 over 18 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 362,305 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal heal for an additional 15% on targets affected by your Healing Rain or Riptide.
Deal 96,148 Nature damage every 1 sec to up to 5 enemies inside of your Healing Rain.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.6 sec, healing all party or raid members within 52 yards for 184719.6.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Surging Totem instantly restores 108,504 health to 5 allies within its area, and its radius is increased by 2 yards.
Targets you heal with Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Chain Heal, or Riptide's initial heal gain 10% increased health for 10 sec.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.
Your critical heals have 215% effectiveness instead of the usual 200%.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 13 yards by 10%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.

Casting Lava Burst increases the healing of your next Healing Surge by 30%, stacking up to 2 times.

Healing Surge applies Flame Shock to a nearby enemy when empowered by Master of the Elements.
Healing Stream Totem heals for 100% more, decaying over its duration.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
Reduces the cooldown of Healing Tide Totem by 45 sec.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and its healing is increased by 8%.
Every third Healing Wave or Healing Surge heals for an additional 50%.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for 229,821 over 9 sec.

Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 920,976. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Every 10 sec, the cast time of your next Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and jump distance increased by 100%. Maximum of 2 charges.
Earth Shield reduces damage taken by 3% and its healing is increased by up to 150% as its target's health decreases. Maximum benefit is reached below 50% health.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.
Chain Heal's mana cost is reduced by 10% and Chain Heal increases the initial healing of your next Riptide by 75%, stacking up to 2 times.
Earth Shield and Water Shield no longer lose charges and are 115% effective.
Every 1 million mana you spend brings a High Tide, making your next 2 Chain Heals heal for an additional 10% and not reduce with each jump.

Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon consumed has a 0.6% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into an Air Ascendant for 15 sec, immediately dealing 382,975 Nature damage to any enemy within 8 yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by 60%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a 30 yd range.

Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Elemental Blast has a chance to unleash a Surging Bolt at your Surging Totem, increasing the totem's damage by 10%, and then redirecting the bolt to your target for 163,774 Nature damage. The damage bonus effect can stack.
While Surging Totem is active, your damage and healing done is increased by 3%.

Lava Lash has a chance to summon a Searing Totem to hurl Searing Bolts that deal 91,231 Fire damage to a nearby enemy. Lasts 8 sec.

Frost Shocks empowered by Hailstorm, Lava Lash, and Fire Nova cause your Searing totems to shoot a Searing Volley at up to 5 nearby enemies for 173,025 Fire damage.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 652,895 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

While Hot Hand is active Lash Lava shatters the earth, causing a Sundering at 50% effectiveness.

Sunderings from this effect do not Incapacitate.

Increases the chance for Windfury Weapon to trigger by 5% and increases its damage by 8%.

When Flametongue Weapon triggers from Windfury Weapon attacks, it has a chance to gather a whirl of flame around the target, dealing 300% of its damage to all nearby enemies.
Increases the damage of Surging Totem by 18%.
Casting Sundering within 40 yards of your Surging Totem causes it to create a Tremor at 100% effectiveness at the target area.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects. 

Air: Your next Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning or Elemental Blast unleashes 3 Surging Bolts at your Surging Totem.

Earth: Direct damage of your next Flame Shock is increased by 300% and it is applied to 5 nearby enemies.

Fire: Your next Lava Lash or Fire Nova grants you Hot Hand for 6 sec.

Summons a totem at your feet for 18 sec that collects power from all of your healing spells. When the totem expires or dies, the stored power is released, healing all injured allies within 52 yards for 30% of all healing done while it was active, divided evenly among targets.

Casting this spell a second time recalls the totem and releases the healing.

Healing Tide Totem now additionally grants 80% increased mana regeneration to allies.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and its healing is increased by 8%.

Summons a totem at the target location with 8.4 million health for 18 sec. 35,365 damage from each attack against allies within 11.5 yards of the totem is redirected to the totem.

Cannot reincarnate an ally who dies to massive damage.
Every 4 casts of Riptide also applies Riptide to another friendly target near your Riptide target.
